title: PES AIML doubt Senior advice desperately needed
content: Is AIML in pes completely AI course or is it cse + aiml like in msrit, RV etc where first two years the syllabus is same as cs and from third year AI syllabus starts?

comments.body: The syllabus starts from 3rd sem itself (so from 2nd year)
Are you going to join cse+aiml in RR?
I am once again troubling you but isn't the second year also same..that's what I've heard other seniors say..please lmk
Nope, it's different. There are 2 core CS courses that have been replaced in sem 3 and 4 respectively.
Alright thank you for entertaining my baseless questions
